title: 1 Bed Studio-Rooftop Infinity Pool KLCC TwinTowers
description: Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety precaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.
